price: ‹ ߟߎ߯ߕߌ߫ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߘߋ߲ߡߛߏ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߴߊ߬ ߝߍ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
